name: Viva Pharmaceuticals, Inc.
description: Viva Pharmaceuticals, Inc. is a leading global manufacturer and supplier of high-quality active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and a provider of advanced contract development and manufacturing services. Founded in 2001, the company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada, and specializes in the production of APIs for the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors. With a commitment to quality and regulatory compliance, Viva Pharmaceuticals operates state-of-the-art facilities that meet stringent international standards. The company focuses on a broad range of therapeutic areas, including oncology, cardiovascular, and infectious diseases, leveraging innovative technologies to enhance product efficacy and safety. In addition to its manufacturing capabilities, Viva Pharmaceuticals offers comprehensive services that include formulation development, analytical testing, and regulatory support, enabling clients to bring their products to market efficiently. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and corporate responsibility, the company actively seeks to minimize its environmental impact while delivering reliable and effective pharmaceutical solutions. Viva Pharmaceuticals is dedicated to advancing healthcare by providing quality products that meet the evolving needs of the global market.

seo.meta_title: Viva Pharmaceuticals, Inc. | Quality Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients
seo.meta_description: Explore Viva Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a leader in the production of active pharmaceutical ingredients and contract manufacturing services. Learn about our commitment to quality and innovation.

faq.question: What does Viva Pharmaceuticals specialize in?
faq.answer: Viva Pharmaceuticals specializes in manufacturing active pharmaceutical ingredients and provides contract development services.

faq.question: Where is Viva Pharmaceuticals headquartered?
faq.answer: Viva Pharmaceuticals is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

faq.question: What are the main products of Viva Pharmaceuticals?
faq.answer: Viva Pharmaceuticals' main products include anticancer APIs and cardiovascular APIs, as well as formulation development services.
